title: You Lost Your Damn Mind
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss Perk getting injured in public and give picks for the Super Bowl, MVP, and a sleeper team. Plus, they discuss Tom Brady's training camp absence, Serena Williams' legacy, and how Russell Westbrook and Patrick Beverly will get along with the Lakers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Marcus Spears, Kendrick Perkins
